import {Component} from 'react' import {v4 as uuidv4} from 'uuid' import './index.css' import PasswordList from '../PasswordList' class PasswordManager extends Component { state = { listItems: [], websiteName: '', userName: '', password: '', } onChangeWebsite = event => { this.setState({websiteName: event.target.value}) } onChangeUserName = event => { this.setState({userName: event.target.value}) } onChangePassword = event => { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } addUserDetails = () => { const {websiteName, userName, password} = this.state const newUser = { id: uuidv4(), websiteName, userName, password, } this.setState(prevState => ({ listItems: [...prevState.listItems, newUser], })) } render() { const {listItems} = this.state return (

)}
) } } export default PasswordManager
